abstract: Ligaya Mishan reviews Manhattan restaurants Sons of Thunder, Pokeworks, Wisefish Poke and East Coast Poke, all specializing in Hawaiian fish dish poke.
lead_paragraph: A raw fish salad from Hawaii is finding a home in New York, where it is featured at three restaurants and by a chef dealing it out of a coffee shop that doubles as a karaoke bar.

headline.main: Poké Reaches the Shores of Manhattan
headline.print_headline: Poké Reaches the Shores of Manhattan

snippet: A raw fish salad from Hawaii is finding a home in New York, where it is featured at three restaurants and by a chef dealing it out of a coffee shop that doubles as a karaoke bar.
